sentence.Network_en: The kernel value on which enterprises rely is changing from materiality to immateriality.
sentence.Network_cn: 企业赖以生存和发展的核心价值正由有形资产向无形资产演变.

sentence.Network_cn: 巴山民歌作为非物质文化遗产,在新时代里应得以传承和发展.

sentence.Network_en: Because of patent itself possessing immateriality, regionally and appropriateness, infringing cases often occur in the practice.
sentence.Network_cn: 由于专利本身所具有的无形性 、 地域性、专有性等的特点, 在实际生活中很容易发生侵权现象.
